titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to accelerate the increase in the child tax credit and to expand refundability of such credit, and for other purposes.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to accelerate the increase in the child tax credit and to expand refundability of such credit, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the child care credit to: (1) revise refundability criteria; (2) accelerate the increase to a $1,000 credit; and (3) increase a qualifying child's age to 19 years old.
